summary: Tested quest questions display bug fix and notification features. All tests passed - 10/10 backend tests, frontend UI verification successful. Quest questions (MCQ, multi-select) display properly with all fields. Notifications for new quests are working correctly.
passed_tests: ✅ BUG FIX: GET /api/child/quests-new returns questions with all fields (question_id, question_text, question_type, options, correct_answer, points)
✅ BUG FIX: Quest total_points calculated correctly from question points
✅ BUG FIX: MCQ questions have proper structure with 4 options
✅ FEATURE: Child has new_quest notification for Test MCQ Quest
✅ FEATURE: Notification has correct type field (new_quest)
✅ Admin quests endpoint returns Test MCQ Quest
✅ Frontend: MCQ quest displays question 'What is 2 + 2?' with options 3, 4, 5, 6
✅ Frontend: Multi-select quest displays 'Which is a need' with options Sweater, Food, Car, Earrings
✅ Frontend: 'Select all that apply' instruction shown for multi-select
✅ Frontend: Notification bell shows unread count badge
✅ Frontend: Notification panel shows 'New Quest: Test MCQ Quest' notification
critical_code_review_comments: Admin quest creation (quests.py lines 64-146) correctly creates notifications for all children in grade range
Teacher quest creation (teacher.py lines 638-718) correctly creates notifications for classroom students
Teacher announcement creation (teacher.py lines 849-898) correctly creates notifications for classroom students
NotificationCenter.jsx (line 27) correctly handles 'new_quest' notification type with Trophy icon and /quests path
Quest questions are properly processed with question_id, question_text, question_type, options, correct_answer, points fields
Default 5 points per question implemented in quests.py line 77
updated_files: /app/backend/tests/test_quest_notifications.py - Created comprehensive test file for quest questions and notifications
seed_data_creation: Created fresh test child user (test_child_1769529375211) with wallet accounts for testing available quests
context_for_next_testing_agent: Quest questions display bug is FIXED - MCQ, multi-select, true/false, numeric question types all display properly with question_text, options, points. Notifications for new quests are WORKING - admin quest creation sends new_quest notifications to children in grade range, teacher quest creation sends to classroom students, teacher announcements send to classroom students. NotificationCenter handles new_quest type correctly.

quest_questions_display.details: Questions display properly with question_text, options, points. MCQ shows radio buttons, multi-select shows checkboxes with 'Select all that apply' instruction.

admin_quest_notifications.details: Admin quest creation sends new_quest notifications to all children in target grade range. Notification includes quest title and reward amount.

teacher_quest_notifications.details: Teacher quest creation sends new_quest notifications to students in the classroom.

teacher_announcement_notifications.details: Teacher announcement creation sends announcement notifications to students in the classroom.

notification_center_new_quest.details: NotificationCenter.jsx handles new_quest notification type with Trophy icon and navigates to /quests
